title: Liaka
excerpt: Laika was a pioneer who made it possible for humans to travel into space, at the cost of her own life.
author: Wildlife Blogger
content: On November 3, 1957,the first living creature to orbit Earth aboard Sputnik 2,launched by the Soviet Union.Officials claimed she survived for days.Later,found that she likely died within hours due to the spacecraft cooling system failed.

title: Scarface
excerpt: Got his name after a fight with another lion left a deep scar over his right eye.That gave him a fierce look
author: Safari Explorer
content: The Legendary Lion of the Maasai Mara.Scarface was one of the most famous lions in Africa. He lived in the Maasai Mara National Reserve in Kenya and became a global icon due to his distinctive appearance and powerful story.

title: Hercules
excerpt: The Parrot That Solved a Murder case.Neelam Sharma was found murdered in her home in Agra. Police struggled to find clues.
author: Bird Lover
content: When the name of the victimâ€™s nephew was mentioned, the parrot screeched loudly in fear,police investigated nephew and he confessed to the crime.
